com.tencent.soter.wrapper.wrap_fingerprint

接口 SoterFingerprintStateCallback


  • public interface SoterFingerprintStateCallback
    Created by henryye on 2017/4/24. The callback for fingerprint authentication prpcess. Note that do not directly rely on the callback to do logic, you should only use it to refresh the UI components.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onAuthenticationCancelled()
      Callback when user cancelled the authentication
      void onAuthenticationError(int errorCode, java.lang.CharSequence errorString)
      Callback when sensor indicates this authentication event as an unrecoverable error, e.g., Auth Key is invalid permanently Note that we separate cancellation event from it and move it to onAuthenticationFailed(), which we think is much more reasonable
      void onAuthenticationFailed()
      Callback when sensor indicates this authentication event as failed, which means user uses a not enrolled fingerprint for authentication
      void onAuthenticationHelp(int helpCode, java.lang.CharSequence helpString)
      Callback when sensor indicates this authentication event as not success, neither not error, e.g., user authenticate with wet fingerprint.
      void onAuthenticationSucceed()
      Callback when sensor indicates this authentication event as success.
      void onStartAuthentication()
      Callback when fingerprint sensor start listening

    • 方法详细资料

      • onStartAuthentication

        void onStartAuthentication()
        Callback when fingerprint sensor start listening

      • onAuthenticationHelp

        void onAuthenticationHelp(int helpCode,
                          java.lang.CharSequence helpString)
        Callback when sensor indicates this authentication event as not success, neither not error, e.g., user authenticate with wet fingerprint.
        参数:
        helpCode - The help code provided by system
        helpString - The hint msg provided by system

      • onAuthenticationSucceed

        void onAuthenticationSucceed()
        Callback when sensor indicates this authentication event as success.

      • onAuthenticationFailed

        void onAuthenticationFailed()
        Callback when sensor indicates this authentication event as failed, which means user uses a not enrolled fingerprint for authentication

      • onAuthenticationCancelled

        void onAuthenticationCancelled()
        Callback when user cancelled the authentication

      • onAuthenticationError

        void onAuthenticationError(int errorCode,
                           java.lang.CharSequence errorString)
        Callback when sensor indicates this authentication event as an unrecoverable error, e.g., Auth Key is invalid permanently Note that we separate cancellation event from it and move it to onAuthenticationFailed(), which we think is much more reasonable
        参数:
        errorCode - The error code provided by system
        errorString - The hint msg provided by system
